actions.name: Abyssal Tether

cost.trigger: The user hits a creature with a Physical- or Special-Category Dark Type Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user hits a creature with a Physical- or Special-Category Dark Type Attack.
Effect: The target is Bound. While Bound, the target is Weak, Dull, Stunted, and Stuck. This Bound effect can only be removed with a Difficult Acrobatics or Running Skill Check.

system.description:
